name: Coil Cat!
description:
Play as Coil Cat!  The house cat with the unique ability to jump to astounding heights using his tail like a spring.  Traverse across three levels and defeat the mice that have infested the maze-like mansion.  Beware of the rabid mice which are not afraid to strike back and stand ground to their new proclaimed territory. 

Controls

Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Press Space while in air to double jump.

Credits 

Dominic Lopez: Programmer
